pyrotechnic_regulations.general_description: Regulations governing the import, export, and transit of pyrotechnic items (fireworks) to protect the population, with specific provisions for different categories and purposes.

authority.customs_role: Monitor bans on imports, exports and transit of pyrotechnic goods
authority.authorization_office: Federal Office of Police - Central Office for Explosives

definitions.pyrotechnic_items: Ready-to-use products containing explosive or ignition charge

commercial: P1, P2 (signalling devices, weather rockets, bird-scaring petards)

illegal.description: Pyrotechnic items that are completely prohibited from import

items.description: Fireworks that explode on the ground such as firecrackers, bangers, jumping crackers, 'tiger' fireworks, 'thunder' fireworks
items.reason: Not considered safe to handle - pose public safety risk

items.description: Commercial pyrotechnic items (P, T, F4) imported without proper authorization
F1, F2, F3 fireworks exceeding 2.5kg imported without authorization
items.reason: Quantities over tourist traffic limit require authorization

items.description: Attempting to aggregate maximum quantities for multiple people with single items
items.reason: Maximum quantities cannot be aggregated for several people with indivisible items
items.example: One 5kg firework battery for 2 people cannot claim exemption

restricted.description: Pyrotechnic items requiring authorization or meeting specific conditions

items.description: Industrial, technical, agricultural pyrotechnic items (P1, P2, P3)
requirements: Import authorization from Federal Office of Police
items.conditions: Always requires authorization regardless of quantity

items.description: Category F4 fireworks for commercial use
items.conditions: Always requires authorization for commercial category

items.description: F1, F2, F3 fireworks exceeding 2.5kg gross weight for personal use
requirements: Import authorization from Federal Office of Police
items.conditions: Authorization required when exceeding tourist traffic limits

items.description: Large firework items that cannot be divided among multiple people
items.conditions: Each person's limit applies individually, no combining allowed

legal.description: Pyrotechnic items allowed under specific conditions without special authorization

items.description: Safe-to-handle fireworks categories F1, F2, F3 for personal use
items.conditions: Maximum 2.5kg gross weight per person per day

items.description: Individual F1, F2, F3 fireworks under personal limits
items.conditions: Each person limited to 2.5kg gross weight per day

items.description: Commercial pyrotechnic items with proper Federal Office of Police authorization

important_notes.tourist_traffic_limit: 2.5kg gross weight per person per day for F1, F2, F3 categories
important_notes.no_aggregation_rule: Maximum quantities cannot be aggregated for several people
important_notes.unsafe_prohibition: Ground-exploding fireworks (firecrackers, bangers, etc.) completely prohibited
important_notes.commercial_authorization: All commercial pyrotechnic items require authorization
important_notes.prosecution_warning: Violations liable to prosecution under SprstG art. 37, SR 941.41
important_notes.enforcement: Prohibited items confiscated and destroyed by cantonal authorities
important_notes.authority_contact: Federal Office of Police - Central Office for Explosives handles authorizations
